project.objective: LightSolver is developing a new paradigm for computing. We have developed a revolutionary Laser Processing Unit (LPU) that outperforms traditional CPUs and GPUs in specific tasks, such as optimizing supply chains, designing new materials, and managing financial portfolios. This new LPU Laser Processing Unit can process NP-hard problems orders of magnitude faster because it has no electronic gradients inside the processor. This LPU is small as a desktop size, operates at normal conditions, and consumes minimal power. This full-stack unit includes three layers to provide the most accurate solution within the shortest time frame: a user interface, an operating system and Hybrid Hardware. Our proprietary hybrid solver combines an all-optical solver based on a pure laser processing unit (LPU) with a digital enhancement that increases the number of spins (variables) whilst decreasing the complexity of the problem. All industries will benefit from optimization problems, including government, healthcare, financial services, retail, manufacturing, energy and utilities, transportation and logistics, and more. Asset optimization is gaining notable importance in the manufacturing and energy sectors due to the possibility of obtaining real-time data LightSolvers platform offers distinct advantages from competitors: Faster and More Accurate Solutions Cost-Effective Manufacturing and Energy Consumption Cloud Accessibility and On-Premises Capability Unique Assisting Algorithms Scalability for Complex Problems

category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).
